thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-MPLX Announces Joint Binding Open Season On Cushing-To-Patoka Pipeline Expansion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-MPLX Announces Joint Binding Open Season On Cushing-To-Patoka Pipeline Expansion
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - MPLX LP:
* MPLX ANNOUNCES SUCCESSFUL JOINT BINDING OPEN SEASON ON CUSHING-TO-PATOKA PIPELINE EXPANSION
* MPLX SAYS COMPLETED A JOINT BINDING OPEN SEASON ON COMBINED OZARK 22-INCH AND WOODPAT 22-INCH PIPELINES FROM CUSHING, OKLAHOMA, TO PATOKA, ILLINOIS
* MPLX SAYS TO CONTINUE PLANS TO INCREASE CAPACITY OF PIPELINE BY PROVIDING OPERATIONAL MODIFICATIONS IN WOOD RIVER, ILLINOIS
* MPLX SAYS EXPANSION OF PIPELINE IN WOOD RIVER, ILLINOIS IS EXPECTED TO BEGIN SERVICE IN Q3 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
